resources.string: This seems something different.\nLooks like you need to be diagnosed in person.\nPlease visit your doctor for further healthcare.
Please enter your name and age for better interaction.

This is a First Aid healthcare assistant app. We suggest you medications in accordance to how you are feeling. We compare your illness with a variety of illnesses and suggest you the most popular and easily available medicine, so they do not cause side effects to most of the people. Do not use this diagnosis for kids of age less than 5 years. Also if you experience different symptoms after having the medications, rush to a Doctor to treat the side effects. \n \nGet Well Soon!
Hi! I am your personal healthcare assistant. Before you start, I suggest you to read the ABOUT section to get a better understanding of how exactly the app works.
